description:
Vice President of Sales

About the Company

Innovative consumer services organization based in Houston

Industry
Consumer Services

Type
Privately Held

About the Role

The Vice President of Sales will be responsible for providing dynamic leadership to oversee the sales processes and operations, lead the sales team to achieve mission-aligned and ambitious targets, and contribute to the organization's overall growth.

Travel Percent
Less than 10%

Functions
• Sales/Revenue
• Account Management/Optimization

Known Requirements
• Bachelor's or master's degree in the relevant field required
• Significant prior professional experience in power solutions and e-frac required
• Superior leader with strong people management skills and proven success achieving sales targets required
